{{Lang|'''Mu Chen'''|zh=沐晨|zh_rm=Mù Chén}} is an open-world [[NPC]] in [[Liyue Harbor]]. He can be found at [[Wanwen Bookhouse]], participating in a discussion with [[Gao Fei]] (06:00 – 18:00).
